entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @POTUS @realDonaldTrump has been promoting a narrative about China’s cover-up with the pandemic. It is happening right here in our country. Let’s see if he will respond with the same energy to our dishonesty.

https://t.co/GbzvOsQg37
